author: giorgio_bracaglia
post: I’ve uploaded for this group only a photograph of a Vern Miller image taken by Fr. Filas who was granted permission by Vern to re create the same findings of the Lepton coin has he did with the Enrie photos See the results at: http://holyshroudguild.org/dan porters blog.html.
title: Father Filas’ “Discover Pilate’s Lepton Coin” Paper Available
